text:
<!everyone>

*Look at the impact you've had over our Autumn programme. On average our students are now:*
> +113% more sure of what to do for their career
> +155% more confident in knowing what next steps to take
> +62% more appreciative of how school prepares them for their future
> +142% more confident about knowing what skills employers are looking for
... pretty amazing considering it was only 2 months long! Fantastic job guys! :ok_hand:

Also...

*REMINDER:* We'll be *closing Slack this Friday* so if you'd like to save your conversations with your mentees, please do so before then!

Otherwise, from the team @ Prospela, we hope you all *enjoy the Xmas break* and have a happy, healthy 2018!! :muscle::stuck_out_tongue_winking_eye:

Hope to speak to you all again in the near future!! :christmas_tree::purple_heart:
Amazing! Have a good Christmas guys! :snowman:
